info.description:
mark3 ===== mark3 provides a lightweight, markdown_ to html parser for python 2.7 and 3. .. _markdown: http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/ Usage ----- Using mark3 is very simple:: from mark3.markdown import markdown html = markdown(raw_text) Deviations ---------- mark3 may differ slightly from the official markdown implementation. If you find a difference between mark3's output and the official markdown's not mentioned here, please `open a ticket`__. .. _ticket: https://bitbucket.org/jlm/mark3/issues __ ticket_ Lists +++++ A

will be placed in an

  • if, and *only if* it's needed:: * foo * bar Will produce the same output as:: * foo * bar Inline HTML +++++++++++ This markdown:: < foo bar> Produces::

    < foo bar>

    Instead of the official markdown implementation output::

    < foo bar>

    Tabs ++++ Tabs are expanded to 4 spaces before parsing. As such, output will never contain tabs. Insignificant Whitespace ++++++++++++++++++++++++ Outputted html doesn't have as much insignificant whitespace as the official markdown implementation.
info.name: mark3
info.summary: A lightweight markdown to html converter.
info.html_description:
mark3 provides a lightweight, markdown to html parser for python 2.7 and 3.

Usage

Using mark3 is very simple:

from mark3.markdown import markdown
html = markdown(raw_text)

Deviations

mark3 may differ slightly from the official markdown implementation.

If you find a difference between mark3’s output and the official markdown’s not mentioned here, please open a ticket.

Lists

A <p> will be placed in an <li> if, and only if it’s needed:

* foo
* bar

Will produce the same output as:

* foo

* bar

Inline HTML

This markdown:

< foo <b>bar</b>>

Produces:

<p>< foo <b>bar</b>></p>

Instead of the official markdown implementation output:

<p>< foo <b>bar</b>></p>

Tabs

Tabs are expanded to 4 spaces before parsing. As such, output will never contain tabs.

Insignificant Whitespace

Outputted html doesn’t have as much insignificant whitespace as the official markdown implementation.
